chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: LibModbus is a free software library to send/receive data with a device which respects the Modbus protocol. This library can use a serial port or an Ethernet connection.
The functions included in the library have been derived from the Modicon Modbus Protocol Reference Guide which can be obtained from Schneider Automation.
The license of libmodbus is LGPL v3.
The licence of programs in the tests directory is GPL v3.

chapter.title: API Reference
chapter.para: LibModbus provides an api to comunicate with modbus enabled equipments and an utility api for version checking.
